title: BSR on Amazon and What it Really Means for Product Sales
description:
*Access all of my Amazon Spreadsheets for Sellers here: 
[]
https://sites.google.com/view/markteach/ecommerce/amazon-seller-tools

And be sure to follow me on my main channel for sellers that I linked below.
* In my experience I have found that a lot of Amazon sellers misunderstand the meaning of the BSR. They know what it is generally but not specifically when it comes to different categories. BSR as it relates to how well a product is selling is not just a number. You cannot just say that a product over 250,000 doesn't sell (as many people do say that). The sales rate associated with a BSR depends greatly on the number of products in the category. In this video I explain and use actual examples with tools to teach how the BSR actually works. Use this link to estimate product sales based on Rank and Category (NOT JUST RANK!) https://www.junglescout.com/estimator/

The follow up video to this one is here: https://youtu.be/LHlE52NJVBA

Seller Assistant App (Chrome Extension)
